content: you will receive a pdf file with step-by-step instructions on how to make the costa beanie sizes from 0-3 to adult skill level beginner the pattern uses standard american terms yarn super bulky category #6 - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - returns/refunds there are no returns on digital files please contact me if you have questions about the pattern - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - i would love to see your finished products tag me on instagram @cj dsgn and use hashtag #costabeanie resell finished product with pattern credit © 2023 cj design all rights reserved
